title: Operations Assistant (Part-Time)
description:
**About Kisi**
==============


We are Kisi, a physical security tech company revolutionizing how businesses access and secure their spaces.

  

Founded in 2012, with headquarters in Brooklyn, an office in Stockholm, and a global team, we create innovative, award-winning hardware and compliance-certified software that enable seamless, cloud-based access to offices, facilities, and buildings. Our mission is to ensure ease of access and remote space management, fostering a future where spaces are securely connected and accessible without boundaries.

  

At Kisi, you’ll join a creative and innovative team with a flat hierarchy, work closely with our co-founders, and enjoy the freedom to work your way with a strong sense of ownership.

  

If you’re passionate about cutting-edge technology and want to be part of a dynamic team that’s making the world more secure and accessible, we want to hear from you!

**What You’ll Do**
==================


As our Operations Assistant, you’ll work closely with the Operations Manager to support a wide range of essential functions:

#### **️ General Operations**

* Support the Operations Manager in administrative tasks and strategic initiatives.
* Help streamline internal processes and ensure alignment across departments.

#### **Logistics Coordination**

* Act as the main point of contact between Kisi and our logistics partners.
* Coordinate shipments, manage inventory movement, and ensure timely deliveries.

#### **Human Resources Support**

* Assist with recruitment logistics, onboarding coordination, and employee documentation.
* Help process payroll, expense reports, and maintain HR records.

#### **Compliance Ownership**

* Assist with key compliance projects including ISO 27001 and SOC 2.
* Help organize documentation, schedule audits, and ensure policy adherence.

#### **Office Management**

* Create a fun, inclusive, and efficient office environment.
* Plan and execute engaging team events and support overall employee experience in Stockholm.

**What We’re Looking For**
--------------------------

* Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
* Proactive mindset with a hands-on approach to solving problems.
* Excellent communication skills in English; Swedish is a plus.
* Ability to handle multiple tasks and prioritize effectively in a fast-paced environment.
* Interest in tech and startup culture is a bonus!
* Entry position, no previous experience required.

**What We Offer**
-----------------

* A flexible part-time role (~20 hours/week), onsite at our Stockholm office located at Hökens Gata 4.
* The opportunity to grow with a forward-thinking company.
* A collaborative and international team environment.
* Regular team events and a welcoming Stockholm office.

**Location:** Onsite, Stockholm, Sweden  

**Type:** Part-Time/Student job/Internship

**Your process with us**
========================


Application > CV screening > Intro call (let’s get to know each other!) > Recruitment task > Technical Interview > Culture Interview > Offer.

  

After successful interviews and the job offer is signed, we will conduct a background check.
company_description: We are Kisi, a physical security technology company that accelerates a world where the right people can share physical resources at any time. Founded in 2012, Kisi operates from a headquarter in Brook

title: Engineering Manager Core Technologies Analytics Hardware, Lund
description:
Job Title
Engineering Manager Core Technologies Analytics Hardware, Lund
Job Description*Are you a leader passionate about innovation and empowering teams? We’re seeking an Engineering Manager to lead Core Technologies Analytics Hardware at our HQ in Lund.*
Who is your future team?
Core Technologies within Axis R&D is an organization that drives, innovates, and provides key technologies to Axis future products and solutions. A fast-growing area is analytics where Core Technologies Analytics is responsible for bringing forward the latest AI algorithms, features and functionality towards a multitude of receivers from our own ASICs, camera products as well as Axis’ analytics solutions in VMS or cloud. More information is available here.  

This area continues to grow, and we are therefore looking for an Engineering Manager for the newly formed Core Technologies Analytics Hardware team. This team will work closely to the other Core Technologies Analytics teams, but with a main focus on the hardware that is essential for the analytics algorithms. The hardware is a mix of sourced IP as well as in-house design. You will lead a team of 10+ highly skilled engineers ranging from newly graduated to senior expert level. You will work closely with external suppliers as well as with several and different counterparts within Axis, and the focus ranges from short-term topics to long-term strategies. You will be responsible for technologies that are key to Axis' future success.
What you’ll do here?
As manager for this team your main tasks will be to:* Own and drive the long- and short-term agendas for the team, from strategies to daily planning, and do that both internally at Core Technologies as well as towards and in collaboration with counterparts within and outside Axis.
* Interact with Axis’ ASIC, product, and SW development organizations to make sure we understand their requests and they our deliveries, negotiate when needed, find conclusions and solutions together, and find ways forward towards successful results.
* Interact with Axis’ suppliers to make sure we are aligned short as well as long term.
* Manage contractual and legal matters that are relevant for analytics hardware.
* Identify and setup projects or activities around new technologies, tasks and requests, make sure the scope and requirements are clear and that each project or activity has sufficient staffing, planning and efficiency.
* Lead the team and individuals in their daily activities, make sure we get the most out of everyone and that they feel support and respect in and for themselves and their tasks. Develop your team and its members related to both the needs of the company as well as in balance with the needs of every individual.
* Perform standard management tasks like salary setting, budgeting, etc.


You will work closely with many organizations and individuals, but especially in close collaboration with the two Engineering Managers for the neighboring Core Technologies Analytics teams.
Who are you?
We believe that you have a genuine interest and talent in leading people and organizations. You find it easy to interact with people and between individuals and organizations and are good bridging gaps and finding ways to come to conclusions and ways forward. You combine the skill of listening with the skill of deciding and can find a good balance between the two.You are a person that is easy to interact with. You are open-minded, curious, supportive and helpful. You have a genuine interest in technology and are eager to learn new things. You can get into new areas and find your way. You know how to find information and keep yourself up to date. You have experience in interacting with companies from around the world. Their culture and ways of working interest you, and you find ways to get the most out of each and every relation and collaboration.
You fulfill the following criteria:* Several years of leadership experience, preferably as a manager and/or project manager in a technology centric organization.
* Strong track record of managing people and teams in the technical forefront.
* Well up to date with the latest technologies and terminologies of AI, including the use and design of such systems.
* The following experience areas are considered as merits: Supplier interaction including contract management; Legal aspects of technologies and their use; ASIC design; Product development
* Background as engineer, preferably in physics, electronics, computer science or similar
* Proficient in English

  

What Axis has to offer
We are a world leader in network video, where cutting-edge technology meets global impact. Here, you’ll contribute to meaningful projects that shape the future of security and surveillance — developing solutions used worldwide.
As a fast-growing company, we offer exciting career opportunities. You’ll grow professionally through continuous learning, supported by a collaborative team that values creativity, innovation, and work-life balance.*Our Lund HQ Campus, including the impressive Grenden building, offers a dynamic environment with spaces crafted to encourage collaboration, whether through informal “**fika**” chats, formal meetings,* *or after-hours activities.* *Check it out:* *Axis HQ*
Your well-being matters to us. We offer a range of benefits, including a company bonus, Friday cake, wellness allowance, health insurance — and even your own Axis bicycle.
To learn more about Axis, our innovative products, solutions, and vibrant company culture, explore:
Life at Axis blog
Engineering at Axis blog
Innovation at Axis  

Ready to Act?  

Axis is a company realizing the benefits of a diverse workforce. We know that diversity in groups creates a better working environment and promotes creativity, something that is fundamental for our success. We welcome all applications.
We go through applications continuously so don’t wait – send in your application today!
In case of questions, please reach out to recruiting manager Jesper Lindström, Director Core Technologies, at +46 46 272 18 00.
This recruitment is managed solely by Axis Communications AB, and we politely but firmly decline all calls from recruitment and consulting companies.
Type of Employment
Permanent Employment
Posting End Date

title: Cloud Architect
Data Scientist - QuantumBlack, AI by McKinsey
description:
**Who You'll Work With**
 Driving lasting impact and building long-term capabilities with our clients is not easy work. You are the kind of person who thrives in a high performance/high reward culture - doing hard things, picking yourself up when you stumble, and having the resilience to try another way forward.
   

  

 In return for your drive, determination, and curiosity, we'll provide the resources, mentorship, and opportunities you need to become a stronger leader faster than you ever thought possible. Your colleagues—at all levels—will invest deeply in your development, just as much as they invest in delivering exceptional results for clients. Every day, you'll receive apprenticeship, coaching, and exposure that will accelerate your growth in ways you won’t find anywhere else.
   

  

 When you join us, you will have:
   

  

* Continuous learning: Our learning and apprenticeship culture, backed by structured programs, is all about helping you grow while creating an environment where feedback is clear, actionable, and focused on your development. The real magic happens when you take the input from others to heart and embrace the fast-paced learning experience, owning your journey.
* A voice that matters: From day one, we value your ideas and contributions. You’ll make a tangible impact by offering innovative ideas and practical solutions. We not only encourage diverse perspectives, but they are critical in driving us toward the best possible outcomes.
* Global community: With colleagues across 65+ countries and over 100 different nationalities, our firm’s diversity fuels creativity and helps us come up with the best solutions for our clients. Plus, you’ll have the opportunity to learn from exceptional colleagues with diverse backgrounds and experiences.
* World-class benefits: On top of a competitive salary (based on your location, experience, and skills), we provide a comprehensive benefits package to enable holistic well-being for you and your family.


**Your Impact**
 As a Data Scientist, you will collaborate with clients and interdisciplinary teams to develop impactful analytics solutions, optimize code, and solve real-world business problems across diverse industries. You’ll grow as a technologist by contributing to cutting-edge projects, R&D, and global conferences while working alongside world-class talent in a dynamic, innovative environment.
   

  

 In this role, you will partner with clients to understand their needs and develop impactful analytics solutions. You will translate business problems into analytical challenges, build models to solve them, and ensure they are evaluated with relevant metrics. You’ll also contribute to internal tools, participate in R&D projects, and have opportunities to attend and present at conferences like NIPS and ICML.
   

  

 Your work will create real-world impact. By identifying patterns in data and delivering innovative solutions, you will help clients maintain their competitive advantage and transform their day-to-day operations. Your contributions will directly influence business outcomes and drive lasting improvements across industries.
   

  

 You will be based in Stockholm, and collaborate closely with data scientists, data engineers, machine learning engineers, designers, and product managers around the world working on interdisciplinary projects that use math, statistics, and machine learning to derive insights from raw data. You will help global companies transform their businesses and enhance performance across industries such as healthcare, automotive, energy, and elite sports.
   

  

 At McKinsey, you’ll thrive in an unparalleled environment for growth. You’ll develop a sought-after perspective by connecting technology and business value, tackle real-life challenges across diverse industries, and collaborate with inspiring multidisciplinary teams, gaining a holistic understanding of AI and its potential to drive transformation.
   

  

**Our Tech Stack**
 While we advocate for using the right tech for the right task, we often leverage the following technologies: Python, PySpark, the PyData stack, SQL, Airflow, Databricks, our own open-source data pipelining framework called Kedro, Dask/RAPIDS, container technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes, cloud solutions such as AWS, GCP, and Azure, and more.
   

  

**Your Qualifications and Skills**
* Bachelors, Masters or PhD level in a discipline such as: computer science, machine learning, applied statistics, mathematics, engineering or artificial intelligence.
* 0-2+ years of professional experience in applying machine learning and data mining techniques to real problems with copious amounts of data
* Programming experience (focus on machine learning): R and/or Python (must), SPSS, SAS, Ruby, Hadoop (valued).
* Ability to prototype statistical analysis and modeling algorithms and apply these algorithms for data driven solutions to problems in new domains
* Ability to independently own and drive model development, balancing demands and deadlines.
* Demonstrated aptitude for analytics.
* While we advocate for using the right tech for the right task, we often leverage the following technologies: Python, PySpark, the PyData stack, SQL, Airflow, Databricks, our own open-source data pipelining framework called Kedro, Dask/RAPIDS, container technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes, cloud solutions such as AWS, GCP, and Azure, and more.
* Strong communication skills, both verbal and written, in English, with the ability to adjust your style to suit different perspectives and seniority levels. Knowledge of Swedish is valued.
* Exceptional time management to meet your responsibilities in a complex and largely autonomous work environment.
* Good presentation and communication skills, with the ability to explain complex analytical concepts to people from other fields.
* Willingness to travel.

title: Operations Assistant (Part-Time)
description:
**About Kisi**
 We are Kisi, a physical security tech company revolutionizing how businesses access and secure their spaces.
   

  

 Founded in 2012, with headquarters in Brooklyn, an office in Stockholm, and a global team, we create innovative, award-winning hardware and compliance-certified software that enable seamless, cloud-based access to offices, facilities, and buildings. Our mission is to ensure ease of access and remote space management, fostering a future where spaces are securely connected and accessible without boundaries.
   

  

 At Kisi, you’ll join a creative and innovative team with a flat hierarchy, work closely with our co-founders, and enjoy the freedom to work your way with a strong sense of ownership.
   

  

 If you’re passionate about cutting-edge technology and want to be part of a dynamic team that’s making the world more secure and accessible, we want to hear from you!
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
 As our Operations Assistant, you’ll work closely with the Operations Manager to support a wide range of essential functions:
   

  

****🛠️ General Operations****
* Support the Operations Manager in administrative tasks and strategic initiatives.
* Help streamline internal processes and ensure alignment across departments.


****🚚 Logistics Coordination****
* Act as the main point of contact between Kisi and our logistics partners.
* Coordinate shipments, manage inventory movement, and ensure timely deliveries.


****👥 Human Resources Support****
* Assist with recruitment logistics, onboarding coordination, and employee documentation.
* Help process payroll, expense reports, and maintain HR records.


****🔐 Compliance Ownership****
* Assist with key compliance projects including ISO 27001 and SOC 2.
* Help organize documentation, schedule audits, and ensure policy adherence.


****🏢 Office Management****
* Create a fun, inclusive, and efficient office environment.
* Plan and execute engaging team events and support overall employee experience in Stockholm.


**What We’re Looking For**
* Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
* Proactive mindset with a hands-on approach to solving problems.
* Excellent communication skills in English; Swedish is a plus.
* Ability to handle multiple tasks and prioritize effectively in a fast-paced environment.
* Interest in tech and startup culture is a bonus!
* Entry position, no previous experience required.


**What We Offer**
* A flexible part-time role (~20 hours/week), onsite at our Stockholm office located at Hökens Gata 4.
* The opportunity to grow with a forward-thinking company.
* A collaborative and international team environment.
* Regular team events and a welcoming Stockholm office.


****Location:****
 Onsite, Stockholm, Sweden
   

  

****Type:****
 Part-Time/Student job/Internship
   

  

****Your process with us****
 Application > CV screening > Intro call (let’s get to know each other!) > Recruitment task > Technical Interview > Culture Interview > Offer.
   

  

 After successful interviews and the job offer is signed, we will conduct a background check.

title: Chef Data & Analytics
description:
**Martin & Servera** 




 Med omtanke om varandra, våra kunder och allas framtid gör vi varje dag lite godare. Och som medarbetare hos oss är du en viktig del av framgången. Vi är en familjeägd koncern med över 3000 medarbetare.
 



  





 Martin & Servera levererar mat och dryck till restauranger, kaféer och storkök över hela Sverige. Här är du med och driver utvecklingen i en tid då digitalisering och ny teknik öppnar upp nya dörrar för oss såväl som våra kunder och hela restaurangbranschen. Genom teknik i framkant, nya arbetssätt och en hög förändringstakt är du med och gör varje dag lite godare. Du blir också en del av en varm och inkluderande kultur där vi jobbar tillsammans och har roligt ihop.
 



 På Martin & Servera är du med och driver utvecklingen i en tid då digitalisering och ny teknik öppnar upp nya dörrar för oss, våra kunder och hela restaurangbranschen. Genom teknik i framkant, nya arbetssätt och en hög förändringstakt är du med och gör varje dag lite godare. Du blir också en del av en varm och inkluderande kultur där vi jobbar tillsammans och har roligt ihop. Eftersom vi jobbar i tvärfunktionella teams med koncernövergripande ansvar är du med och utvecklar många olika delar av vår verksamhet.
 



  






 Var med och gör varje dag lite godare
 




 Hos oss är vi stolta över att arbeta med mat och dryck och är marknadsledande i branschen. Vi har en stark och långsiktig ägare i form av Axel Johnsson, vilket skapar trygghet och stora möjligheter. Vårt hållbarhetsarbete är i framkant och en hörnsten i vår strategi. Eftersom vi tycker det är viktigt att arbetslivet går ihop med vardagen finns det möjligheter till både hemarbete och flexibla arbetstider.
 



  





**Rollen** 




 Vill du vara med och forma framtidens dataplattform och driva en teknisk utveckling som möjliggör insiktsdriven affär? Martin & Servera söker nu en strategisk och tekniknära
 **Chef Data & Analytics** 
 som vill leda ett tvärfunktionellt team och skapa rätt förutsättningar för organisationen att fatta datadrivna beslut – genom en modern, skalbar och affärsnära plattform.
 



  





**En möjliggörande roll i hjärtat av digital transformation** 




 Martin & Serveras IT-funktion är inne i en expansiv fas med tydlig strategi för digital modernisering. Rollen som Chef Data & Analytics spelar en avgörande roll i detta genom att ansvara för vår dataplattform (Azure), teknisk utveckling och integrationer – och att driva ett nära samarbete med affären för att förstå behoven och översätta dessa till rätt tekniska lösningar.
 



 Din roll blir att möjliggöra, koordinera och stödja analysförmåga genom att säkra teknik, struktur och samspel. Du leder ett kompetent team med intern och extern expertis inom BI, data engineering och integration.
 



  





**Ditt uppdrag:** 



* Leda och vidareutveckla Martin & Serveras dataplattform och integrationslösningar
* Vara en strategisk partner till affären – förstå verksamhetens behov och omsätta dem till tekniska lösningar
* Skapa struktur, governance och gemensam prioritering i ett område med stor potential
* Inspirera och utveckla ett starkt tekniskt team (ingenjörer, arkitekter, konsulter)
* Samarbeta med breda delar av verksamheten: restauranghandel, logistik, e-handel, SAP-projektet m.fl.



  





**Vi söker dig som har:** 



* Minst 5 års erfarenhet i ledande roller inom data/IT-utveckling
* Teknisk expertis inom moderna data- och integrationsplattformar (gärna Azure, Power BI, SAP)
* Erfarenhet av att driva utvecklings- och förändringsprojekt med många intressenter
* God förståelse för hur teknik möjliggör analys och beslutsstöd – även om du inte själv leder analysarbetet



 Meriterande är erfarenhet från e-handel, grossistbranschen eller komplexa koncerner.
 



  





**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!** 




 Navigio är vår partner i denna rekrytering. Vi granskar ansökningar löpande så vänligen ansök så snart som möjligt, så hör vi av oss efter 18e augusti. Om du har frågor om rollen eller processen, vänligen kontakta Meilin Pei Purroy på meilin.pei.purroy@navigio.se.
 



  





*Martin & Servera är Sveriges ledande restauranggrossist och levererar dagligen drycker, färskvaror, livsmedel, utrustning, tjänster och kunskap till restauranger och storkök. Martin & Servera-gruppen består av moderbolaget Martin & Servera samt dotterbolagen Martin & Servera Restauranghandel med restaurangbutiker, Martin & Servera Logistik, Galatea och Sorundahallarna.* 




  





*Tillsammans gör vi på Martin & Servera-gruppen skillnad för alla som älskar mat och dryck. Med omtanke om varandra, våra kunder och vår planet gör vi varje dag lite godare. Som medarbetare hos oss är du en viktig del av vår framgång. Här tas dina erfarenheter, idéer och kunskaper tillvara och vi växer och utvecklas tillsammans. Välkommen till oss.*

title: Data Analyst (1-year fixed-term position)
description:
**Team:** 
 Subscription Data Enablement (under News Media, Subscription)
 **Work location: Oslo or Stockholm**
**About the team** 
 Subscription Data Enablement holds the commercial analytics mandate for all Schibsted brands (VG, Aftenposten, E24, Bergens Tidende, Stavanger Aftenblad, SvD, Aftonbladet and more). We build best-in-class data capabilities, democratize insights, and develop ML models to create personalized subscriber experiences. Our mission is to drive engagement and increase customer lifetime value through data-driven decision-making.
   

  

**What will you do**
 As a member of our Analytics team—working alongside Analysts, Data Engineers, and Data Scientists—you will:
   

  

* Perform advanced analysis: Work under guidance to apply statistical and machine-learning techniques to derive insights from customer and behavioral data
* Ensure data governance: Help establish processes that guarantee data accuracy, integrity, and security
* Collaborate cross-functionally: Partner with marketing, product, and commercial teams to identify data needs and translate findings into clear recommendations
* Build dashboards & reports: Create interactive dashboards in Tableau to enable stakeholders across brands to explore key metrics
* Model data with dbt: Assist in developing and maintaining data models using dbt to support scalable, self-service analytics and consistent business definitions across teams


**What we offer**
 At Schibsted, you’ll join a hybrid, informal, and collaborative workplace in one of the Nordic region’s most forward-looking media companies. You’ll be part of one of Scandinavia’s largest data communities, where knowledge sharing and personal development are highly valued. We offer competitive employee benefits, clear career paths within the Schibsted Group, and free digital subscriptions to all our news brandsts, clear career paths within Schibsted.
   

  

 ,
   

  

**Who you are**
* You hold a degree in Economics/Finance, Computer Science, Statistics/Mathematics, Engineering, or equivalent experience
* 1–3 years of hands-on experience in analytics, data science, or business intelligence (commercial/customer-centric focus is a plus)
* Strong proficiency in SQL
* Experience with Tableau or Power BI
* Familiarity with cloud-based analytics platforms is appreciated
* You’re a curious problem-solver who communicates technical concepts clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences
* You enjoy teamwork and thrive in a fast-paced, data-driven environment

title: Customer Success Manager - Private Sector
description:
At Stratsys, we offer a SaaS platform that streamlines compliance in business-critical areas such as Sustainability, GRC, and Quality work. Unlike other compliance tools, we go a step further by moving organizations from reporting to action and effectively distributing responsibility internally.
 



 We’re looking for a Customer Success Manager to join our team in either Gothenburg or Stockholm. In this role, you’ll work with private-sector clients, focusing on those with products in GRC and ESG. You’ll manage a wide range of customer relationships and help clients navigate regulatory frameworks while driving value through our platform.
 



 As a Customer Success Manager, you’ll focus on both our customers and our platform. You’ll be the main contact for small and large clients and take overall responsibility for their success. This role is all about combining platform knowledge with relationship building, so we’re looking for someone who enjoys working directly with our platform, staying close to customers, and driving growth. A data-driven approach will help you find ways to improve and create strategic solutions that bring real value to our clients.
 



  





 WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU? 💡
 


* An engaging work environment with people with a shared mindset to deliver a world-class product in important and impactful areas.
* Opportunities to learn about GRC, ESG, and the financial sector, even if you don’t have prior experience.
* Challenging, varied, and engaging work tasks with room and encouragement to be independent and innovative.
* Join a high-energy, close-knit team where every success is celebrated together. Please look at our Instagram to get an insight into our culture.
* Work from a fantastic and central office in A House the Ark in Stockholm or at Kungsportplatsen in Gothenburg.
* Join a company with great benefits – read more about our benefits here!



  





**About The Role 📌** 




 You’ll have a strategic impact by guiding clients from adoption to expansion—a key factor in our growth. Working closely with Project Managers and Sales Specialists, you’ll ensure clients fully utilize the platform, strengthening loyalty and opening doors for further sales.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 


* Build long-term customer relationships based on trust and engagement, working with both senior decision-makers and operational teams.
* Ensure customers achieve their goals and get full value from our platform.
* Assist customers with platform adjustments and improvements.
* Advise customers, raising awareness and interest in our products.
* Develop deep product knowledge to become a trusted advisor for customers.
* Sales responsibility: Collaborate with Sales Specialists to proactively manage sales activities, meet revenue targets, and identify new opportunities within existing accounts.
* Manage personal responsibilities with an individual budget, including a clear sales and budget responsibility.
* Handle negotiations, renewals, and agreements with clients.
* Work with Sales Specialists to analyze product usage, identify growth opportunities, and optimize product utilization.



  





 YOUR BACKGROUND ✔️
 


* Bachelor’s or master’s degree in a relevant field, such as business administration or systems science.
* 2-5 years of relevant work experience, preferably as a Customer Success Manager.
* Experience working with negotiations and customer agreements.
* Strong interest in systems and digitization with experience in handling and learning new systems.
* Fluent in Swedish with excellent English skills.



 Bonus Qualifications:
 


* Understanding of regulatory requirements for industries like banking and finance.
* Experience with GRC or ESG related processes.
* Tech-savvy and eager to learn more about technical solutions.



  





**About You 👀** 




 To thrive in the role, we see that you are a relationship-builder with a genuine interest in customer-oriented work and smart digital solutions. You are self-motivated, proactive, and have a positive attitude. You are curious and eager to learn, embracing new developments in the ever-evolving tech landscape. You value a positive team environment and the opportunity to be part of a growth journey. You are simply ready for your next adventure with Stratsys!
 



  





**About Us 🚀** 




 Does this look like a role for you? Do not hesitate—show your interest today since we are working ongoing with the selection of candidates.
 



 Is this particular role not quite right for you? Show your interest for future openings by connecting with us. We look forward to hearing from you!
 



 Want to read more about us and your future colleagues or take part in our everyday life? Visit jobs.stratsys.com or follow us on LinkedIn or Instagram.

title: Network Engineer
company_industry: Telecommunications and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Do you want to work in one of the most exciting and complex areas of telecom technology? At Telia, we’re at the heart of ongoing transformation, and Voice Core and Telco Cloud are key areas in that journey. I’m Tomas Pöhnert, unit leader in Voice Core Networks within Group Technology, and I invite you to become part of a world-class team that thrives on collaboration, curiosity, and deep technical passion.
   

  

**As a Network Engineer…**
 We are an easy-going unit of people who are passionate about voice technology, services, and customers. Our team of 15 engineers has different skills and backgrounds, and we work together across 2G/4G/5G, IMS, Network Slicing, Telco Cloud, and beyond. We are looking for curious, knowledge-driven individuals with some telco experience who are ready to grow into the next generation of telecom experts.
   

  

 In this role, you will work in an international and cross-country setting, collaborating closely with engineers, architects, developers, and vendors. You will be part of a collaborative, learning-focused team that values growth, impact, and continuous improvement.
   

  

**Who We’re Looking For…**
 You will contribute to the configuration, maintenance, and troubleshooting of mobile voice core systems and participate in development and design of new services. You will collaborate with suppliers and other technical teams on fault analysis and solution delivery. Over time, you will also contribute to automation, agile practices, and quality improvements. We offer full onboarding, and support from experienced team members — while also expecting you to grow into autonomy, take initiative, and shape our future. On-call support rotation may be part of the role in later stages.
   

  

 We’re looking for someone who’s eager to grow, enjoys exploring new technologies, and thrives in a collaborative environment. You might not tick every technical box yet, but you bring a solid foundation and a desire to become an expert in Voice Core. You are customer-focused, committed, and ready to take long-term ownership of your role.
   

  

 You likely have around 5 years of experience in telecom or a related field, with a background in mobile networks, system operations, or cloud infrastructure. You are comfortable using scripting or automation to improve systems, and you’re motivated to learn more about virtualized and cloud-native network functions. You are familiar with agile ways of working and fluent in English (spoken and written). Most importantly, you are someone who is driven, humble, and ready to grow.
   

  

**We are more than a workplace**
 Join our inclusive team and collaborate with over 15,000 talented colleagues from around the globe. Recognized as a Climate Leader in the Nordics and Baltics, we're passionate about creating great products and delivering extraordinary customer experiences while always prioritizing sustainability. We believe our people are our most valuable asset, ensuring everyone feels welcome and valued. When you join us, you'll receive a comprehensive benefits package tailored to your local market, opportunities for remote work, and more. You'll also have the chance to earn an annual bonus based on your performance and Telia's results. If you want to make a real impact, this is the place where you belong.
   

  

**Ready to make better happen?**
 We are looking forward to your application by 2025-08-31. If you are selected for the next stage in the process, you'll be contacted by our Hiring Manager/Talent Acquisition Partner. Required controls will be performed.
   

  

 If you want to know more about this position, please contact me Tomas Pöhnert at tomas.pohnert@teliacompany.com.
   

  

**Join us and let’s make better happen – together!**

title: Enterprise Solutions Architect - Stockholm
description:
The customer platform built to acquire, service and grow lifelong customers.
   

  

**About Planhat:** 
 Planhat is reimagining how businesses grow with their customers. Our cutting-edge Customer Platform empowers B2B teams to manage success, revenue, and relationships through one intelligent, flexible interface. We help companies unlock the full potential of their customer data—powered by automation, analytics, and AI. If you thrive at the crossroads of technology and strategic impact, we want to hear from you.
   

  

**The Opportunity:**
 We’re looking for a forward-thinking
 **Enterprise Solutions Architect** 
 to join our global team. In this role, you’ll help our most strategic customers harness Planhat’s capabilities—including AI-driven automation, customizable workflows, and advanced data modeling—to transform how they manage the customer journey.
   

  

**This isn’t account management.** 
 It’s solution architecture. It's a technical strategy. It’s enabling companies to scale with intelligence. Future proofing the way they interact with their data in Planhat.
   

  

**What You’ll Do:**
* Lead with Innovation: Architect sophisticated solutions for customer success teams using Planhat’s AI-powered workflows, smart alerts, and automation features.
* Be the Strategic Technical Partner: Build deep, trusted relationships with enterprise customers, advising on how to embed Planhat into their tech stack and business processes.
* Own the Technical Lifecycle: From onboarding to maturity, ensure technical success and product adoption through seamless integrations, troubleshooting, and optimization.
* Drive Intelligent Automation: Help customers leverage Planhat’s native automation engine and AI insights to streamline processes, detect churn risk, and drive renewals.
* Manage a Strategic Portfolio: Oversee a book of enterprise clients with complex requirements—tracking technical health, engagement trends, and roadmap alignment.
* Influence Product & AI Capabilities: Act as the voice of the customer to our product and AI teams—bringing real-world insights that help shape the evolution of the platform.


**You Might Be A Fit If You:**
* Have 5+ years in a technical customer-facing role (TAM, Solutions Architect, Solution/Sales Engineer, Integration Lead) in SaaS, ideally with data-heavy or AI-enabled platforms.
* Are comfortable working with APIs, webhooks, JSON, data pipelines, and custom integrations (experience with tools like Salesforce, HubSpot, Snowflake, Looker, etc.).
* Can diagnose complex technical issues and explain solutions clearly to non-technical stakeholders.
* Are excited about the power of AI to transform workflows and decision-making—and you know how to make that real for customers.
* Have a proactive, consultative mindset—you’re not solving tickets, you’re designing outcomes.
* Digging under the “hood” is second nature to you. You’re a natural problem solver who takes initiative, dives deep into the unknown, and leaves no stone unturned when uncovering solutions, identifying recurring issues, and creating helpful resources for clients
* Bonus: You’ve worked with CRM or customer data platforms before.


**Why Join Planhat?**
* Shape the future of intelligent customer management at one of the most innovative platforms in the SaaS space.
* Collaborate with a global team of passionate builders and thinkers.
* Work for a product-led company that leads with innovation
* Competitive salary, equity options, and flexible working conditions.
* Build long-term relationships with forward-thinking customers who want to innovate, not just maintain.

title: Data Scientist
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Climate Data and Analytics
description:
**Data Scientist** 




  





 Do you want to design cutting-edge AI and ML solutions, work with advanced data models, and empower businesses with innovative analytics?
 



  





 Nexer Insight is looking for a talented Data Scientist to join our team in Stockholm, Malmö, or Gothenburg. We invite you to embark on an exciting journey where you'll work with fascinating clients, tackle varied and challenging tasks, and enjoy exceptional benefits. At Nexer Insight, we are committed to leveraging advanced analytics, machine learning, and AI to drive innovation and deliver impactful solutions for our clients.
 



  





**Nexer Insight** 




 Nexer Insight is a company that embodies entrepreneurship and innovation. As a Data Scientist with us, you'll work with cutting-edge technologies, including LLMs (Large Language Models), RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), and advanced AI solutions. We value teamwork, professional growth, and a vibrant community spirit. With us, you'll have the opportunity to work on exciting projects, collaborate with experts in the field, and make a meaningful impact in the intersection of data science and AI.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop advanced AI/ML models and design solutions leveraging LLMs for various AI use cases, including RAG and intelligent agents.
* Apply machine learning, statistical methods, and predictive modeling to solve real-world problems.
* Build and deploy data pipelines and cloud-based architectures for ML workloads and MLOps.
* Innovate and collaborate with clients to discover new business opportunities and develop tailored solutions.
* Work with NLP, computer vision, and containerized applications to deliver high-impact projects.
* Leverage platforms like Azure Databricks, Azure Data Lake, and Azure ML for scalable and efficient workflows.
* Promote best practices for data science, from architecture and data quality to reliability and performance.



  





**Who You Are** 




 We expect you to have:
 


* Minimum 4 years within Data Science
* Strong understanding of LLMs and experience building solutions on top of them for AI-driven solutions.
* Experience with RAG and AI-driven agents.
* An analytical mindset and strong business acumen.
* Problem-solving aptitude and a proactive mindset.
* Hands-on experience with applied ML, statistics, and cloud architectures for MLOps.
* Proficiency in Python, PySpark, and familiarity with tools like Databricks.
* Knowledge of computer vision, NLP, SQL, and containerized apps.
* Experience with Azure cloud services such as Azure ML and Azure Data Lake.
* Fluency in Swedish and English.



  





**Why Nexer Insight?** 




 At Nexer Insight, we invest in our employees by providing professional development, certifications, and a vibrant working culture. With us, you'll be part of a team pushing boundaries and using advanced data science to create meaningful solutions for leading clients.
 



  





 Are you ready to take the next step in your career and explore the forefront of AI and data science? Apply today and join us on this exciting journey!

title: Cybersäkerhetsspecialist  / Penetration tester
description:
**Techster Solutions** 
 befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst
 **3+** 
 års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.
   

  

 Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.
   

  

 Generellt
   

  

 Är du en erfaren och driven cybersäkerhetsspecialist med fokus på penetrationstester och åtgärder i både onprem och molnmiljöer? Vill du arbeta med säkerhetstester, identifiera sårbarheter och leda kunder genom åtgärdsrekommendationer och implementeringar? Då kan detta vara rollen för dig!
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Vi söker en
 **Cybersäkerhetsspecialist** 
**/ Penetration Tester** 
 som kan ta ett helhetsgrepp om säkerhetstester – från identifiering av sårbarheter till åtgärdsförslag och genomförande. Du kommer att arbeta med
 **automatiserade plattformar** 
 för penetrationstester inom infrastruktur, webbapplikationer och andra kritiska IT-miljöer.
   

  

 I din roll kommer du att:
   

  

* Genomföra penetrationstester och säkerhetsgranskningar på både webbapplikationer och infrastruktur onprem såväl som Cloud
* Analysera resultat från tester och identifiera sårbarheter och rådgöra med kund.
* Ta fram åtgärdsförslag och genomföra säkerhetsförbättringar hos kunder.
* Rådgiva kunder i säkerhetsstrategier och best practices.


**Kvalifikationer**
 Vi tror att du har:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av penetrationstester inom infrastruktur, webbapplikationer och molntjänster.
* Bred kunskap och förståelse för företagsmiljöer och molnplattformar som Azure, AWS eller Google Cloud.
* Förståelse för sårbarhetsanalys, hotmodellering och attacker i verkliga scenarier samt duktig på att uttrycka sig och förklara detta för motparter.
* Förmåga att ta kunder från testning till implementerade säkerhetsåtgärder.
* Erfarenhet av automatiserade testverktyg och manuella tester.
* Kunskap om relevanta säkerhetsstandarder och ramverk (exempelvis OWASP, NIST, MITRE ATT&CK).


**Meriterande**
* Certifieringar såsom OSCP, OSWE, CISSP, CEH eller liknande.
* Erfarenhet av DevSecOps och säker kodgranskning.
* Förmåga att utveckla skript och verktyg för säkerhetstester.


**Ansökan**
 Tror du att du är
 **Techster Solutions** 
 nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

**Arbetsplats och kultur**
 Vi är ett entreprenörsdrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.
   

  

 Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Senior Platform Engineer to Handelsbanken
description:
*Join Handelsbanken’s Advanced Analytics & AI department as a Senior Platform Engineer! You’ll build and operate cutting-edge data and machine learning capabilities, playing a crucial role in driving our business forward with data-driven insights.*
**Your team**
 At Handelsbanken, we’re on a mission to lead the industry in advanced analytics and AI, delivering superior products, services, and experiences to our customers. Our team leverages statistics, machine learning, and cutting-edge technologies across diverse areas such as content personalisation, product development, and business strategy.
   

  

 We thrive in a cross-functional environment characterised by initiative, collaboration, and innovation. Together, we tackle business challenges by predicting outcomes, deciphering complex data relationships, and building models that enhance our customers’ experiences.
   

  

**Your role**
 Delivering business value from data is challenging, and it all starts and ends with great engineering. As a Senior Platform Engineer, your focus will be on constructing and maintaining our hybrid data platforms, leveraging your expertise to create efficient data and machine learning pipelines. Our platforms span both on-premises and cloud environments, so it’s essential that you enjoy working with SRE in a Linux environment—bonus points if you prefer the terminal.
   

  

 We believe that DevOps and software engineering practices are the foundation for delivering ML & AI to production, enabling our branch offices to utilise the insights and models we create. You will work closely with Data and ML engineers to ensure we have the best data platforms possible. We work closely with our data scientists who primarily focus on identifying use cases and business optimisations. We are looking for an experienced platform engineer who thrives in all parts of the ML delivery chain—from sourcing, transforming, and processing data to operationalising and improving models, and engaging with stakeholders. If you are a seasoned engineer eager to work hands-on, enhancing platforms to expand in CI/CD and ML pipelining, the Advanced Analytics & AI team at Handelsbanken is an excellent choice.
   

  

 ,
   

  

**Your profile**
 We see that you have several years of professional experience as a Data/DevOps/ML Engineer and hold a Master's degree in a technical field. This has given you extensive experience in software development (you are proficient in Python and SQL) and a deep understanding of system design. You are skilled in working with data and building data pipelines, including data modelling, orchestration, and validation using tools like dbt, Prefect, and Spark. You have experience in containerised development within a Linux environment and deploying ML models in production, i.e. exposure to MLOps. Additionally you are familiar with test-driven development practices and with infrastructure as code tools such as Terraform and Ansible. We see that you are willing to learn, or already have, basic Swedish language skills. As a person you possess excellent problem-solving skills and enjoy tackling challenges with code. The ideal candidate is curious and inventive, continuously striving for improvement. They share our commitment to being smart, humble, and, above all, collaborative.
   

  

**Welcome with your application**
**Contact details**
**Recruiting manager:**
 Mikael Twengström, mikael.twengstrom@handelsbanken.se
   

  

**Talent Acquisition Partner:** 
 Alva Jonerot, alva.jonerot@handelsbanken.se
   

  

**Union representative Finansförbundet:** 
 Per Almshult, per.almshult@handelsbanken.se
   

  

**Union representative Akademikerföreningen:**
 Bjarne Nilsson, bjarne.nilsson@handelsbanken.se

 befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst

 års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.
   

  

 Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas.

 Vi söker en självgående och målmedveten säljare med dokumenterad erfarenhet av försäljning inom cybersäkerhet. Du är välbevandrad inom IT-säkerhet och har en god förståelse för lösningar som SOC, Pentest, EDR samt de utmaningar dagens IT-avdelningar står inför.
   

  

 Du har ett skarpt affärssinne, drivs av att skapa nya affärsmöjligheter och trivs med att arbeta resultatinriktat. Rollen erbjuder stor frihet att forma din arbetsdag – perfekt för dig som är ansvarstagande, högpresterande och tycker det är kul att göra affärer.

**Ansökan**
 Tror du att du är
 **Techster Solutions** 
 nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

 Arbetsplats och kultur
   

  

 Vi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.
   

  

 Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Data Scientist
description:
Join Dustin’s Data Science-team and turn data into impactful AI solutions that drive real business value—working with experts at the forefront of machine learning and Generative AI.
   

  

**This is what makes the position as Data Scientist unique**
* Be part of a highly skilled, collaborative team that sits within the business function, ensuring your work directly impacts strategic goals
* Gain hands-on experience with diverse cloud environments and cutting-edge methodologies in a forward-thinking tech setting
* Drive innovation by contributing to an organization with bold ambitions to integrate AI solutions enterprise-wide


 My name is Carl Command. I am managing the Analytics team, and the hiring manager for this role. As a leader, I thrive to see people develop and grow. I give a lot responsibilty to team, they are the experts, my role is to be there to guide when needed. To make your life easier. I always strive to create a culture of openness where everyone is free to speak their mind.
   

  

**Your role & influence as Data Scientist**
*Responsibility* 
 : You will be given responsibility for transforming complex data into actionable insights by developing advanced analytical solutions that support strategic decisions and align with business goals through close collaboration with stakeholders.
   

  

*Collaboration* 
 : Together with your team, you take care of delivering impactful, in-house developed AI and machine learning solutions that drive business value. You'll work closely not only with your immediate team members in Dustin's AI Lab, but also with Data Engineering and various Business Units to develop Gen AI applications, and translate insights into concrete actions across the organization.
   

  

**Core Activities**
* Performing advanced data analysis and exploration to generate actionable insights for the organization
* Designing, developing, and deploying machine learning and Gen AI models to address business challenges
* Collaborating closely with stakeholders and cross-functional teams to ensure solutions align with strategic goals and deliver measurable impact.


**Benefits Of Joining Dustin**
 We believe there's more to Dustin than just the benefits listed here. You'll fully understand this once you're with us. Curious? Our Life at Dustin - Dustin Sweden page has you covered.
   

  

**You can find more of our benefits below in the vacancy.**
****This is what we imagine you bring****
 We envision you as a curious and driven individual who leverages data and advanced analytics to deliver impactful AI solutions aligned with business goals.
   

  

**Additionally, It's Important That You Have**
* Experience with at least 1 year in a similar role and a proven track record of bringing machine learning solutions to production
* Technical skills, such as proficiency in Python and SQL
* The ability to work effectively in English, as it is the primary language of communication in our team and company
* Experience developing Generative AI solutions, is a plus


****What can you expect next?****
 To Ensure a Fair Recruitment Process Free From Unconscious Bias, We Handle Your Application Anonymously And Do Not Accept Cover Letters. Please Refrain From Sending One, So That The Selection Is Based Solely On Professional Competencies. We Expect The Following Steps In The Recruitment Process
   

  

* Telephone screening with Manon van Lieshout
* 1st interview with hiring manager Carl Command
* Case interview with Carl Command & future colleague from the Data Scientist team
* Assessment


 For questions about the position, please contact the TA Partner Manon van Lieshout via manon.vanlieshout@Dustin.com.

title: Konsultchef Digitala Arbetssätt och BIM
description:
**Om jobbet** 




 Vi söker dig som vill ta ett helhetsgrepp om vår operativa konsultverksamhet och samtidigt vara med och forma en ny roll hos oss. På Insikt arbetar några av Sveriges vassaste specialister inom digitala arbetssätt och BIM med ambition att förändra branschen. Vi söker dig som kan göra oss ännu bättre. Vi vill utmanas och utvecklas tillsammans med dig.
 



  





 Som Konsultchef hos Insikt arbetar du både strategiskt och operativt:
 


* I uppdrag som specialist eller projektledare
* Affärsutveckling och tillväxt
* Utveckla och driva vår interna organisation och arbetssätt



  





**Kvalifikationer:** 



* Respekterar att hos oss är alla välkomna. Här har alla samma värde. En människas hudfärg, kön, födelseort, sexuella läggning eller religiösa övertygelse har ingenting med hennes mänskliga kvalitéer att göra.
* Akademisk examen (t.ex. inom teknik eller arkitektur)
* Minst 10-15 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom konsultverksamhet
* Haft personalansvar för minst 5 personer
* Haft försäljningsansvar över 5 msek
* Erfarenhet av projektledning av större projekt (>3 msek/ 5 personer)
* God kunskap i relevanta programvaror och digitala arbetssätt (t.ex. Autodesk Revit, Autodesk Construction Cloud, Dalux, StreamBIM, Revizto, PowerBI, MS Fabric mfl.)
* Genomgången ledarskapsutbildning

title: Senior Storage Engineer
description:
Vattenfall IT’s Data Centre department manages on-premises workloads and Public Cloud services under a hybrid strategy. While the Public Cloud Platform Services team handles cloud-based workloads, the Data Centre team oversees country-based Data Centers and is transitioning from traditional hosting to Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) platforms to meet regulatory and business-specific needs.
   

  

 Private Cloud Platform Services
   

  

 A new department within the Data Centre organization manages Private Cloud Platform Services, focusing on VMware, Windows & Linux servers, and Storage & Backup. It is structured into three specialized sub-departments. Your sub team will focus on Storage & Backup (Data Protection) solutions.
   

  

**What will you do?**
 As Operational Engineer (Storage) you will be mainly responsible for managing the storage solutions in our datacenters. You will drive complex changes, actively support new implementations, and care for service improvement through problem management.
   

  

 Furthermore, you will work on Servers, alignments with Floor and Hardware Management, and interconnection with other systems (e.g. Operating Systems, Network, Data Bases etc). The Operational Engineer is responsible for the storage administration, SW and HW maintenance, disaster recovery protection and supports the deployment of new services works on operation concepts and with system and security.
   

  

  

  

 Your tasks and responsibilities:
   

  

* Maintenance of our Storage systems, including participation in on-call and daily shifts and managing operational incidents.
* Planning, coordinating and working on changes based on incidents or improvements in our environment.
* Collaborating with other departments to ensure that IT operations are aligned with organizational goals and objectives.
* Automating our storage operations.
* Coordinating and executing activities for service lifecycle management (planning, migrations, installation, upgrade and decommission).
* Designing infrastructure based on application specific requirements.
* Development and maintenance of technical documentation
* Leading small size infrastructure initiatives
* Joining improvement initiatives in the Storage & Backup area together with the team.


**Company Description**
 Vattenfall is a European energy company with approximately 21 000 employees. For more than 100 years we have electrified industries, supplied energy to people’s homes and modernized our way of living through innovation and cooperation. We are looking for talented individuals who, in addition to their passion for their own role, also have strong team spirit and want to contribute to supporting a meaningful corporate mission.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 You are an Experienced Storage Engineer working with NetApp solutions
   

  

 You are driven by technical and operational challenges and have a desire to enable your team to improve and deliver efficient, stable, compliant, and secure services.
   

  

 You enjoy leading initiatives, and you are able to plan your own work. You give advice for improvements that lead to a permanent solution to problems or complex customer questions.
   

  

 You enjoy communicating and working closely with customers, stakeholders, and team members Furthermore you bring most of the following:
   

  

* Knowledge of IT service management frameworks such as ITIL.
* Knowledge of data center related solutions and technologies (storage/FC switches/compute/networking/backup/security).
* Experience in managing and troubleshooting storage protocols (NFS/CIFS/ISCSI/FC).
* Experience with Brocade SAN fabrics (zoning, upgrades, clean-up and troubleshooting).
* Experience with storage-based DR and backup solutions.
* Fluency in English, both written and verbal.
* Ansible / Shell scripting knowledge, knowledge from vSan solutions


 Additional Information
   

  

**Our offer**
 Good remuneration, a challenging international and multi-cultural work environment, and the possibility to work with some of the best in the field. You will be working in an interdisciplinary team, and you can always count on support from committed colleagues. We offer attractive employment conditions and opportunities for personal and professional development.
   

  

**More Information**
 We welcome your application in English. We kindly request that you do not send applications by any means other than via our website as we cannot guarantee that we will be able to process applications that are not made via our website.
   

  

  

  

 For more information about the recruitment process you are welcome to contact our recruiter Folmer Koper (folmer1.koper@vattenfall.com)
   

  

 At Vattenfall we are convinced that diversity contributes to building a more profitable and attractive company, and we strive to be a good role model regarding diversity. Vattenfall works actively for all employees to have the same opportunities and rights regardless of gender, ethnicity, age, transgender identity or expression, religion or other belief, disability or sexual orientation.
   

  

 The security of Vattenfall and its employees is essential. For that reason, a pre-employment screening will be part of your recruitment process. The screening is based on the role you will fulfill within Vattenfall. The screening will be performed by a third party, Validata.
   

  

  

  

 We look forward to receiving your application!

title: Verksamhetsutvecklare inom digital produktion
description:
Arbetsplatsbeskrivning
   

  

 Är du redo för en större uppgift?
   

  

 Polismyndigheten är Sveriges största myndighet med ca 40 000 medarbetare över hela landet. Hos oss får du möjlighet att bidra till Polisens uppdrag att öka tryggheten och minska brottsligheten i samhället.
   

  

 HR-avdelningen har i uppgift att skapa förutsättningar för ett verksamhetsdrivet, professionellt, tillgängligt och likvärdigt HR-stöd inom Polismyndigheten. Avdelningen ansvarar för myndighetens övergripande arbete inom bland annat kompetensförsörjning, kompetensutveckling, rekrytering och bemanning, arbetsgivarpolitik/avtal, chef- och medarbetarskap, arbetsmiljö och kultur.
   

  

 Enheten för kompetensutveckling har ett ansvar för kompetensutveckling och lärande i Polismyndigheten inklusive genomförandet av strukturerad fort- och vidareutbildning samt annan utbildning som Polismyndigheten är ansvarig att anordna enligt lag eller förordning.
   

  

 Enhetens uppdrag innebär ett ansvar att möta Polismyndighetens behov av kompetensförsörjande åtgärder genom att styra, stödja och skapa förutsättningar för verksamheten samt att planera, genomföra, utveckla, följa upp och kvalitetssäkra prioriterad fort- och vidareutbildning.
   

  

 Arbetsbeskrivning
   

  

 Arbetet innebär att du tillsammans med dina kollegor kommer att arbeta med att ställa om och utveckla Polismyndighetens utbildningsverksamhet till mer flexibla, verksamhetsnära och nätbaserade lärandeformer. Du med din mediepedagogiska expertis kommer också att arbeta stöttande och förutsättningsskapande så att fler kan göra mer när det gäller kompetensutveckling och lärande.
   

  

 Du kommer att medverka i och driva arbetet för en förändrad syn på lärande i Polismyndigheten. Du bidrar med dina pedagogiska kunskaper genom att handleda och stödja organisationen i såväl utveckling som omställning av nya eller befintliga utbildningar. Du kommer även att leda, driva och samordna kortare och längre utvecklingsuppdrag inom utbildningsverksamheten.
   

  

 Exempel på arbetsuppgifter är:
   

  

* Mediepedagogisk produktion av Polismyndighetens utbildningar
* Utveckling av digitalt lärande inom Polismyndigheten
* Arbete med olika digitala verktyg så som LMS, författarverktyg, e-mötessystem m.m. för utveckling av effektivare lärandeformer
* Sammanföra innehåll, pedagogik och design i polisens lärplattform
* Olika typer av handledning för att stötta verksamheten inom området kompetensutveckling och lärande
* Samverka med olika enheter och sektioner för att säkerställa att utbildningsmaterialet är relevant och anpassat efter verksamhetens behov


 Hos oss har du möjlighet att arbeta både flexibla arbetstider och på distans ett par dagar i veckan. Som anställd hos oss har du även en friskvårdstimme i veckan.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer
   

  

 Detta är en möjlighet för dig som har:
   

  

* Akademisk examen inom exempelvis pedagogik, alternativt annan utbildning kombinerat med arbetslivserfarenhet som arbetsgivaren bedömer likvärdig
* Erfarenhet av minst sex månaders aktivt arbete med mediepedagogisk produktion som exempelvis manusproduktion, film, ljud, författarverktyg
* Erfarenhet av mediepedagogisk handledning och support
* Erfarenhet av arbete med LMS
* Erfarenhet att utveckla teknikförstärkt lärande och lärande i vardagen
* Erfarenhet av självständigt arbete med produktion av lärande/blandat lärande
* Mycket god förmåga att uttrycka dig på svenska i tal och skrift


 Det är meriterande om du även har:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av produktion av grafiskt bildmaterial och illustrationer
* Kunskap om produktion i Articulate Storyline, Premiere Pro, Photoshop, Illustrator eller After Effects (Adobe creative cloud)
* Utbildning eller erfarenhet inom interaktionsdesign och användarcentrerat arbete
* Erfarenhet av arbete med tillgänglighetsfrågor
* Erfarenhet av projektledning
* Erfarenhet av att driva och medverka i förändringsarbete


 Personliga egenskaper
   

  

 För att kunna driva modernt och effektfullt lärande i vardagen är du trygg i pedagogiska frågor och med digital produktion och du hittar möjligheter utifrån de förutsättningar som finns. Du har lätt för att anpassa dig efter ändrade förutsättningar, kan driva flera processer samtidigt och klarar av att hantera arbetstoppar på ett balanserat sätt. Du har en förmåga att strukturera upp och driva komplicerade processer med fokus på effekt och verksamhetens behov.
   

  

 Som person behöver du vara självgående och samtidigt trivas med att samarbeta med kollegor och övriga aktörer inom verksamheten. I syfte att stödja organisationen på bästa sätt skapar du framgångsrika samarbeten genom att du är inlyssnande och nyfiken.
   

  

 Då verksamheten är inne i en intensiv förändringsperiod och att behovet av kompetenshöjande insatser är dynamiskt behöver du vara flexibel och lösningsfokuserad.
   

  

 Du är trygg i dig själv, prestigelös, modig samt har ett starkt uppdragsfokus.
   

  

 Vi kommer att lägga stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper.
   

  

 Kontaktpersoner
   

  

 Sofia Karlsson, Rekryterande chef
   

  

 jennie-sofia.karlsson@polisen.se
   

  

 Hanna Berglund, HR-konsult
   

  

 hanna-k.berglund@polisen.se
   

  

 Fackliga företrädare
   

  

 Polisförbundet, Sofia Ask, tfn: 010-563 87 10 SACO, nås via Polisens växel 114 14 SEKO Polisen, Karna Tillheden, tfn: 010-561 66 27 ST, nås via Polisens växel 114 14
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 Arbetsort: Stockholm (Sörentorp), Malmö, Göteborg (Grimmered) alt. Linköping.
   

  

 Arbetstid: Flextid
   

  

 Tillträde: Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 Funktion: Verksamhetsutvecklare
   

  

 Anställningsbenämning: Handläggare
   

  

 Arbetsprov kan förekomma under rekryteringsprocessen.
   

  

 Ansök genom att bifoga ditt CV (vi vill inte ha något personligt brev) och besvara urvalsfrågorna. Frågorna utgår från kravprofilen för den här rekryteringen och dina svar ligger till grund för det urval som sker i processen. Att besvara frågorna är en förutsättning för att din ansökan ska anses komplett.
   

  

 Vänligen notera att krav och eventuella meriter ska vara uppfyllda vid ansökningstillfället.
   

  

 Vi använder e-rekrytering för att effektivisera och kvalitetssäkra rekryteringsarbetet. Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via Polisens rekryteringsstöd Visma Recruit.
   

  

 Har du skyddade personuppgifter, referenser eller liknande information som du själv bedömer som skyddsvärd rekommenderar vi att du kontaktar ansvarig HR-konsult innan du går vidare med din ansökan.
   

  

 Om du vill komplettera din ansökan vänder du dig till ansvarig HR-konsult.
   

  

 En anställning hos Polismyndigheten kan komma att inledas med en provanställning om sex månader.
   

  

 Polismyndigheten är Sveriges största myndighet. Vi erbjuder dig en arbetsplats som stimulerar till mångfald, kreativitet och personlig utveckling.
   

  

 Läs gärna om våra förmåner som anställd hos polisen på: polisen.se/erbjudande
   

  

 Vi bedriver vår verksamhet enligt vår värdegrund: engagemang, effektivitet och tillgänglighet. Som medarbetare inom polisen agerar du för likabehandling. Det är en förutsättning för rättssäkerhet, rättstrygghet och för polisens legitimitet i samhället. Som företrädare för polisen respekterar du allas lika värde och skapar förtroende för polisen.
   

  

 Läs gärna mer om polisen och vår verksamhet på www.polisen.se

title: Senior Business Development Manager - Critical Technologies, Stockholm
company_industry: Government Administration, International Trade and Development, and Public Policy Offices
description:
* Classification: Austrade Overseas Performance Level B (AOPL B)
* Location: Stockholm, Sweden
* Salary: SEK 542,256 – 774,651


**The Role**
 The Australian Government has a focus on supporting Australian businesses to diversify exports and grow in new markets. As part of this role, you will work closely with peak industry bodies to deliver a program of activities that support the diversification of Australian exporters into new markets and helps exporters to grow in established markets. You will be based in the Austrade office in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

**The Role Will**
* Develop and maintain relationships with peak industry bodies in close collaboration with Austrade’s Australia-based team.
* Deliver targeted and high impact support to Australian businesses.
* Support the delivery of in-market trade events and business missions.
* Leverage local market expertise to raise awareness of new export opportunities amongst target Australian businesses.


**Duties include**
* Grow Australia’s exports to the market by providing trade advice to a portfolio of targeted Australian businesses from the Critical and Enabling Technologies sector.
* Identify opportunities for Australian businesses by leveraging local market expertise and undertaking sector research.
* Establish and maintain close working relationships with targeted peak industry bodies, in collaboration with Austrade’s Australia-based team.
* Plan and support visits to the market by Australian peak industry bodies and Australian businesses, helping to design visit programs that deliver trade outcomes and foster new business linkages.
* Work collaboratively within the Austrade network to contribute to service delivery and achieve desired outcomes, including by maintaining a strong connection with Austrade’s Australia-based staff.
* Uphold a best practice approach to client servicing and embrace Austrade’s digital approach to client service delivery.
* Ensure a strong working relationship with other Australian agencies in the market including the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade and state and territory government agencies.


 For more detailed information please view the Job Information Pack.
   

  

**Eligibility**
 To be eligible for consideration and appointment you must have:
   

  

* Work Authorisation - to be eligible for employment with Austrade in the Sweden, candidates must be legally authorised to live and work in the Sweden at the time of appointment.
* Language - the successful candidate must be a highly motivated team member, fluent in written and spoken English.
* Security Clearance - the successful applicant must be willing to complete an Entry Level Screening Pack and be confirmed as a suitable person to access Government resources prior to commencement in the role.


**Closing date**
**Applications close 11:30pm Wednesday 03 September 2025 (Country/local time).**
 Only candidates who complete their application in Austrade’s online recruitment system will be considered. Email applications cannot be accepted.
   

  

 This is a locally-engaged position governed by Austrade’s Overseas Engaged Employees terms and conditions of employment and Sweden labour law. Candidates must currently have the right to live and legally work in Sweden. Austrade will not be able to provide any sponsorship letter nor be involved in the work visa application process.

title: Lösningsarkitekt
description:
Arbetsplatsbeskrivning
   

  

*Är du redo för en större uppgift?*
*Till vår grupp söker vi nu en lösningsarkitekt som vill vara med på en resa där vi effektiviserar Polismyndighetens verksamhetsstöd. Hos oss kommer du tillsammans med engagerade och trevliga kollegor utvecklas och få erfarenheter för livet, samtidigt som ditt arbete bidrar till att öka tryggheten och minska brottsligheten i Sverige.*
 Som lösningsarkitekt kommer du att tillhöra gruppen Nationella stödsystem som arbetar med system inom bland annat kompetensutveckling, internkommunikation och ekonomi, både egenutvecklade och inköpta. Gruppen har flera stora utvecklingsuppdrag framför sig och befinner sig också i en spännande fas där t.ex. arbetet med RPA (Robotic Process Automation) ska skalas upp för att kunna stödja flera verksamhetsområden inom Polismyndigheten.
   

  

 Vi har våra arbetsplatser på Kungsholmen i Stockholm eller i Linköping, och du har möjlighet att arbeta hemifrån två dagar i veckan när arbetet tillåter.
   

  

 Som statligt anställd på Polismyndigheten erbjuder vi även särskilda förmåner kring pension, föräldralön, friskvård m.m. Läs mer om våra förmåner och villkor här.
   

  

 I gruppen Nationella stödsystem erbjuder vi dig:
   

  

* Ett utmanande och utvecklande uppdrag i en stor organisation
* Balans mellan arbetsliv och privatliv genom bl.a. möjlighet till visst arbete på distans, flexibla arbetstider och goda förutsättningar för träning och återhämtning
* En av marknadens bästa tjänstepensioner
* Att få vara med och bidra till att öka tryggheten och minska brottsligheten i Sverige


 Arbetsbeskrivning
   

  

 Som lösningsarkitekt kommer du tillsammans med utvecklingsteam, drift och verksamhet säkerställa att våra tekniska val stödjer både nuvarande och framtida behov inom utveckling, förvaltning och underhåll av våra system.
   

  

 Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:
   

  

* Vara teknisk rådgivare och stöd i arkitektur- och utvecklingsfrågor
* Delta i krav- och riskanalys samt utredningar
* Översätta verksamhetskrav till tekniska lösningar eller vägval gällande inköpta system
* Säkerställa att lösningar följer säkerhetskrav, prestanda och kostnadseffektivitet
* Samverka med våra säkerhetsavdelningar och andra grupper
* Designa lösningar med containerplattform och virtualiserade eller fysiska servrar
* Dokumentera och kommunicera lösningsarkitektur till både tekniska och icke-tekniska roller
* Delta i framtagande av upphandlingsunderlag
* Bidra till gruppens övergripande strategi, arbetssätt och vidareutveckling av våra produkter


 Kvalifikationer
   

  

**Detta är en möjlighet för dig som har:**
* Högskoleutbildning inom IT eller annan utbildning/erfarenhet som Polismyndigheten bedömer som motsvarande
* Flera års erfarenhet som lösningsarkitekt som arbetsgivaren bedömer relevant
* Erfarenhet av att ha tagit fram lösningar med containerplattformar och virtualiserade servrar
* Mycket god förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift på svenska och engelska


 Anställningen kräver svenskt medborgarskap.
   

  

**Det är meriterande om du även har:**
* God kännedom om kravställning inom offentlig sektor med erfarenhet av att arbeta starkt styrd av regelverk och lagstiftning
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av Kubernetes, Docker och/eller OpenShift
* Erfarenhet av Kubernetes i produktionsmiljö
* Erfarenhet av säkerhetsarkitektur
* Kunskap om containerhantering i kombination med CI/CD-pipelines
* CKA/CKAD-certifiering
* Erfarenhet av att ha tagit fram lösningar på fysiska servrar
* Vana att arbeta i agila miljöer med DevOps/Scrum/SAFe-ramverk eller liknande


**Personliga egenskaper:**
 Du har stort intresse för teknik, förvaltning och ett tryggt samhälle. Som person är du nyfiken, kreativ, uthållig, och engagerad med en stark vilja att skapa kvalitativa, verksamhetsnära och förvaltningsbara lösningar utifrån budget, mål och lagstiftning. Du är prestigelös, tydlig och flexibel med fokus på samarbete och kommunikation gentemot olika delar av organisationen samt är van att axla olika typer av ansvar självgående och proaktivt. Du är pedagogisk och har en förmåga att förklara tekniska lösningar för icke-tekniska parter.
   

  

 Kontaktpersoner
   

  

 Har du frågor om uppdraget är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef på tfn: 076-143 64 64
   

  

 Har du frågor gällande rekryteringsprocessen kontakta ansvarig HR-konsult: Amanda Gimmerborn, amanda.gimmerborn@polisen.se
   

  

 Fackliga företrädare
   

  

 Polisförbundet, Sofia Ask, telefon: 010-563 87 10
   

  

 SACO, nås via e-post: saco-s.avdelningarna@polisen.se
   

  

 SEKO Polisen, Karna Tillheden, telefon: 010-561 66 27
   

  

 ST Stockholm, st.region-stockholm@polisen.se. ST Öst, st.region-ost@polisen.se.
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 Anställningsform: Tillsvidareanställning med provanställning om sex månader
   

  

 Arbetsort: Stockholm eller Linköping
   

  

 Arbetstid: Förtroendearbetstid
   

  

 Tillträde: Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 Funktion: IT-arkitekt
   

  

 Ansök genom att bifoga ditt CV (vi vill inte ha något personligt brev) och besvara urvalsfrågorna i ditt ansökningsmejl. Frågorna utgår från kravprofilen för den här rekryteringen och dina svar ligger till grund för det urval som sker i processen. Det är därför viktigt att du svarar tydligt och utförligt på frågorna och inte hänvisar till andra handlingar t.ex. CV.
   

  

**Att besvara frågorna är en förutsättning för att din ansökan ska anses komplett.**
 Besvara följande urvalsfrågor som en del av din ansökan.
   

  

* Har du högskoleutbildning inom IT alternativt motsvarande utbildning/erfarenhet?


 JA/NEJ – om JA beskriv din utbildning/erfarenhet
   

  

* Har du flera års erfarenhet som lösningsarkitekt?


 JA/NEJ – om JA beskriv din erfarenhet
   

  

* Har du erfarenhet av att ha tagit fram lösningar med containerplattformar och virtualiserade servrar?


 JA/NEJ – om JA beskriv din erfarenhet
   

  

* Har du mycket god förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift på svenska och engelska?


 JA/NEJ
   

  

* Har du svenskt medborgarskap?


 JA/NEJ
   

  

* Har du god kännedom om kravställning inom offentlig sektor med erfarenhet av att arbeta starkt styrd av regelverk och lagstiftning?


 JA/NEJ – om JA beskriv din kännedom/erfarenhet.
   

  

* Har du dokumenterad erfarenhet av Kubernetes, Docker och/eller OpenShift


 JA/NEJ – beskriv din erfarenhet
   

  

* Har du erfarenhet av Kubernetes i produktionsmiljö?


 JA/NEJ – beskriv din erfarenhet
   

  

* Har du erfarenhet av säkerhetsarkitektur?


 JA/NEJ – beskriv din erfarenhet
   

  

* Har du kunskap om containerhantering i kombination med CI/CD-pipelines


 JA/NEJ – beskriv din kunskap
   

  

* Har du CKA/CKAD-certifiering?


 JA/NEJ
   

  

* Har du erfarenhet av att ha tagit fram lösningar på fysiska servrar?
